title: === LF decent bronze players for ranked play ===
body:
Hi there,

I'm looking for bronze players for ranked play. I just transferred my account from NA ( where I was gold 4) to OCE so had to replay placement matches. I currently got placed in bronze and looking to climb up quickly. I main adc and mid as secondary but can also play supp if required.

Must meet below criteria:

+Must have at least 1:1 ratio of win/losses in ranked play.
+Must cope well under pressure aka no raging/flaming others.
+Decent personality aka no little kids must be mature.

If this looks like you please add me in game and we can chat thanks.

replies.body: Add  me, i play what ever lane
Add me I play top lane {{champion:122}}
hey bro I'm up for a game or two a bit at some time in the future mid jgler
